description: User stories for expanding the drone simulator

stories.title: Battery System
stories.description: Drone should have a battery that drains over time during flight
acceptance_criteria: Battery drains based on throttle usage
Drone loses power when battery reaches 0%

stories.title: Wind Effects
stories.description: Add environmental wind that affects drone flight
acceptance_criteria: Wind force applied to drone physics
Wind direction and strength configurable in settings
Visual indicator of wind on HUD
Wind affects drone differently based on orientation

stories.title: Crash Detection
stories.description: Detect when drone crashes into obstacles or ground
acceptance_criteria: Crash triggers visual feedback (screen shake, particle effect)

stories.title: Flight Recording
acceptance_criteria: Record button in UI to start recording

stories.title: Multiple Drone Models
stories.description: Support different drone models with varying characteristics
acceptance_criteria: At least 3 different drone models selectable
Each model has different weight, thrust, and agility
Visual model changes based on selection

stories.title: Time Trial Mode
stories.description: Race against the clock through checkpoints
acceptance_criteria: Timer starts when passing first checkpoint
Timer stops when passing final checkpoint
Display current time and best time
Visual and audio feedback when passing checkpoint

stories.title: Day/Night Cycle
stories.description: Dynamic lighting that changes time of day
acceptance_criteria: Option to set specific time of day
Drone lights turn on automatically at night

stories.title: Mini-map
stories.description: Display a small map showing drone position
acceptance_criteria: Shows checkpoints if in time trial mode
